page.title: 15EDUCATION:LIFE AT SCHOOL
page.content: At 7.30 I get up I make my bed then I get dressed. I have a wash then I have my breakfast of rice crispies and toast then I have a cup of tea. I get my bag ready for school and I comb my hair.I put my coat on and set off for school.I sometimes call at the shop for some sweets.I get to school and we have assembly then we have writing or spelling.The bell goes at 10.40 .We go out to play .The bell goes again at 11.00 for maths. At 12.00 it is dinner time.We have a drink of milk.After dinner it is playtime .We play elastics which is a game where we use elastic .We jump over two pieces of elastic in time to a song .The bell rings .We all go into the classroom. We pick a book from the library and read it then we go onto the playing field to have games.
